definition: to take (after a struggle)/to wrest/to seize/to capture/to win (a trophy)
to seize/to take away forcibly/to wrest control of/to compete or strive for/to force one's way through/to leave out/to lose
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

sentences.english: The Hong Kong team also won a bronze medal in the water ski team event.
sentences.chinese: 香港隊在滑水隊際賽中同時亦奪得一面銅牌。

sentences.english: The victory was scored one day after China edged out Singapore to win the womens team title.
sentences.chinese: 一天前，中國隊擊敗新加坡隊奪得女團冠軍。

sentences.english: They were determined to win the seat back from Labor.
sentences.chinese: 他們決心從工黨手裏重新奪得這個議席。

sentences.english: China's world champion Xiao Qin won the pommel horse gold medal.
sentences.chinese: 中國的世界冠軍肖欽奪得鞍馬金牌。

sentences.english: Finally, Zhu Pingkang won the first prize in the styling contest of motorboats with a score of 4297.
sentences.chinese: 最終，朱平康以4297分奪得摩托艇花樣賽一等獎。

sentences.english: I wonder if China or America will win most medals.
sentences.chinese: 我在猜想是中國還是美國會奪得最多的金牌。

sentences.english: Lin Dan won the championship in a stunning turnaround.
sentences.chinese: 林丹驚天逆轉奪得冠軍。

sentences.english: Luna out shoot all the other rivals and won the gold medal.
sentences.chinese: 陶路娜戰勝了所有其他對手，奪得了金牌。

sentences.english: Run the water until it gets hot.
sentences.chinese: 克拉姆在賽跑中成績突出奪得金牌。

sentences.english: Congratulations on winning 2009 Taipei Golden Horse for Best Supporting Actress.
sentences.chinese: 恭喜紅姐姐，奪得2009金馬獎最佳女配角。

sentences.english: Jose Mourinho is not expecting Chelsea to stroll to another Premiership title.
sentences.chinese: 穆帥預測本賽季要奪得英超冠軍也不輕鬆。

sentences.english: Finally, Zhu Pingkang, with a score of 4297, won the first prize in the synchronized motorboat racing.
sentences.chinese: 最終，朱平康以4297分奪得摩托艇花樣賽一等獎。

sentences.english: Tao Luna out shoot all the other rivals and won the gold medal.
sentences.chinese: 陶路娜戰勝了所有其他對手，奪得了金牌。

sentences.english: He has had all-round success in his study this term.
sentences.chinese: 他這學期的學習成績奪得了滿堂紅。

sentences.english: He has already been the champion of the boat race three times.
sentences.chinese: 他已經奪得過三次賽船大會的冠軍了。

sentences.english: Mid-2001 exam, our school won the urban areas, students sail Kaozhuang Yuan.
sentences.chinese: 2001年中考，我校揚帆同學奪得了市區中考狀元。
